General.Name: Guangzhou Zhujiang Brewery Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangzhou Zhujiang Brewery Co., Ltd. engages in the production and dealing of beer and its related products. It offers beer products under the Zhuijang Beer, Zhuijang Draft Beer, and Supra brands. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China.
